mapper.select: select e.eventTime as eventTime, e.name as eventName, t.name as eventType, e.id as eventId, t.id as eventTypeId, e.quota as quota, e.siteId as siteId, e.createdTime as createdTime, e.lastModifiedTime as lastModifiedTime, a.id as attendeeId, a.score as score, a.rank as rank, a.userId as userId, a.seq as seq, a.status as status from events e, attendees a, eventTypes t where e.eventTypeId = t.id and a.eventId = e.id

select e.eventTime as eventTime, e.name as eventName, t.name as eventType, e.id as eventId, t.id as eventTypeId, e.quota as quota, e.siteId as siteId, e.createdTime as createdTime, e.lastModifiedTime as lastModifiedTime, a.id as attendeeId, a.score as score, a.rank as rank, a.userId as userId, a.seq as seq, a.status as status from events e, attendees a, eventTypes t where e.eventTypeId = t.id and a.eventId = e.id and e.status = #{status};

select e.eventTime as eventTime, e.name as eventName, t.name as eventType, e.id as eventId, t.id as eventTypeId, e.quota as quota, e.siteId as siteId, e.createdTime as createdTime, e.lastModifiedTime as lastModifiedTime, a.id as attendeeId, k.id as kidId, a.score as score, a.rank as rank, k.name as kidName, a.userId as userId, a.seq as seq, a.status as status from events e, eventTypes t, attendees a, kids k where e.id = a.eventId and e.eventTypeId = t.id and k.id = a.kidId
insert events (id, name, eventTypeId,siteId, quota, eventTime, createdTime,lastModifiedTime) values (#{id},#{name},#{eventTypeId},#{siteId},#{quota},#{eventTime},now(),now())

select e.eventTime as eventTime, e.name as eventName, t.name as eventType, e.id as eventId, t.id as eventTypeId, e.quota as quota, e.siteId as siteId, e.createdTime as createdTime, e.lastModifiedTime as lastModifiedTime, a.id as attendeeId, k.id as kidId, a.score as score, a.status as status, a.rank as rank, k.name as kidName, a.userId as userId, a.seq as seq from events e, eventTypes t, attendees a, kids k where e.id = a.eventId and e.eventTypeId = t.id and k.id = a.kidId and e.id = #{id};
update events set name=#{name}, quota=#{quota}, eventTypeId=#{eventTypeId}, siteId=#{siteId}, eventTime=#{eventTime} where id = #{id};
